title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained CLI and server for running Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with GPU/Metal acceleration.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async/sync APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration to use Ollama models as LLM or Chat endpoints.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user, dark/light themes).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; sync/async, streaming, POJO mapping, Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot alternative with inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB + Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to query Ollama models inside the editor; generate, refactor, explain code.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server on Kubernetes with GPU nodes.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async HTTP client for Ollama API with serde types.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama; supports chat, generation, embeddings, streaming.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Community-curated collection of GGUF models optimized for Ollama with performance notes.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers questions using local Ollama models with per-guild configs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes for summarization or Q&A.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack bot using Socket-mode to chat with Ollama models privately or in channels.
